item.title: Getting started with webgl
item.description: Installation or Setup # WebGL is a browser technology so there isn’t much to set up other than to have a browser. You can get started with WebGL on JSFiddle or Codepen or JSBIn or any number of other sites that let you edit HTML, CSS, and JavaScript online though there will be a few limitations (see below). You can also host open source files on github pages or similar services.
